bibl.title: Fish and Chits: The Synodontis Schall. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Textual sources and archaeological evidence for the Synodontis Schall, the commonest Nile fish (gr. χοῖρος) are reviewed. Ταρίχιον may be interpreted as pickled fish even in monastic sources.
bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah J., Fish and Chits: The Synodontis Schall. Avec résumé en anglais.
Textual sources and archaeological evidence for the Synodontis Schall, the commonest Nile fish (gr. χοῖρος) are reviewed. Ταρίχιον may be interpreted as pickled fish even in monastic sources.
